procedures.specialInstructionsAfter: Avoid activities that may damage your nails for 24 hours.

procedures.specialInstructionsBefore: Do not apply lotion or oil to your hands before the procedure.
procedures.specialInstructionsAfter: Avoid hot water and harsh chemicals for 24 hours.

procedures.specialInstructionsBefore: Ensure your nails are clean and trimmed.
procedures.specialInstructionsAfter: Use cuticle oil to keep your nails hydrated.

procedures.specialInstructionsBefore: Wash your hair before the appointment.
procedures.specialInstructionsAfter: Use a quality conditioner to keep your hair hydrated.

procedures.specialInstructionsBefore: Avoid washing your hair for 24 hours before coloring.
procedures.specialInstructionsAfter: Use color-safe shampoo and conditioner to maintain the color.

procedures.specialInstructionsBefore: Cleanse your face thoroughly before the procedure.
procedures.specialInstructionsAfter: Avoid touching your face and use gentle skincare products.

procedures.specialInstructionsBefore: Avoid excessive sun exposure for one week before the procedure.
procedures.specialInstructionsAfter: Apply moisturizer regularly and avoid harsh skincare products.

procedures.coveringHealingTime: Peeling may last for several days
procedures.specialInstructionsBefore: Discontinue use of retinol and exfoliating products for one week before the procedure.
procedures.specialInstructionsAfter: Keep skin hydrated and protected from the sun.
